DependencyPreference.Description: Who are the key staff members we should engage for this service?

TeamPreference.Description: In-person or virtual orientation session. Customized for 1-3 members on your team to help them better understand CEB resources and services.
TeamPreference.Name: CEB Orientation

DependencyPreference.Description: Who should we coordinate with for this service?

TeamPreference.Description: In-person or virtual attendance by CEB to share the latest resources and services relevant to your team’s priorities and interests.
TeamPreference.Name: CEB Attendance at Upcoming Staff Meetings

DependencyPreference.Description: Who are the key staff members we should engage for this service?

TeamPreference.Description: Virtual session with team to review the key features of the member website and how to best leverage throughout the membership.
TeamPreference.Name: Website Overview

DependencyPreference.Description: Who are the key staff members we should engage for this service?

TeamPreference.Description: 60 minute virtual web sessions primarily focused on new insights, best practices, and practical implementation guidance. Formats vary but include CEB-led, Peer-led, and interactive forums.
TeamPreference.Name: Ongoing Webinars

DependencyPreference.Description: Who are the key staff members we should engage for this service?

TeamPreference.Description: Add CEB site link to internal portal for easy access
